name: Out of CTRL (Scratchy_Watchy)
description:
Challenging game with a unique control scheme. Created for GMTK Game Jam 2020

Each key on you keyboard is a platform or a shield. Guide the little green circle from left Ctrl to the right. Activate up to 5 keys and test you coordination and skills/

IMPORTANT: don't hold the keys, just press them. Some keayboards cant detect more than 3-5 key presses at a time.
